page.title: 17KINGSGROVE FARM BRAILSFORD
page.content: Mr & Mrs T Dalton. 500 acres made up of 5 farms. Married daughter lives at Hazelhurst,Farm Manager at Home Farm, Gamekeeper at Snapes Farm.Keep cattle for fattening for beef. 1000 animals p.a.disposed of mainly at local sales Have managed grass & some arable. These fields are larger than some in area. Grow winter & spring barley. Employ 2 men. Own tractors & other machinery.2 children of marriage,24yr old son is chef & 26yr old daughter is married and lives at Hazelhurst.2 children of 2nd marriage l5 & 16yr old at school in Edinburgh.Hobbies include gardening,fishing & shooting.{Anti- {hunting}Hunt not allowed across land. In conflictt with Ramblers Asscn & County Council over footpaths.Objects to Gypsies because of untidiness, litter & intrusion on land.
